footer.desc: Providing professional service with Waterproofing Materials and Isolation products in the sector for 30 years.

f1.title: Custom Sizes & Quantities
f1.desc: Your orders are prepared in the sizes and quantities you request.

f2.title: Best Price
f2.desc: We offer the best quality at the best price.

f3.title: Production is Our Business
f3.desc: Production is provided in our facility as quickly as possible according to your requests.

about.p1: Anıl Plas Plastik İnşaat İzolasyon İmalat Sanayi Dış Ticaret İthalat İhracat A.Ş. has been serving for 30 years in the sector by producing Waterproofing Materials, Membranes and Under-tile Covers.
about.p2: In 2019, it started the production of foundation walls Drainage Board and Polyethylene Nylon with the Anıl Plas brand. The factory established is equipped with the most modern technological products and experienced expert staff.
about.p3: The company has not compromised on the principle of providing the best service and product, and has offered solutions to meet the needs of its customers. Within the framework of the production and service understanding at international standards, which is among the basic principles of the company, its compliance has been certified by approved companies.
about.highlight: The company aims to multiply its power in the domestic market and to be powerful enough to compete in the world market.

v1.title: Delivery to All Over the World
v1.desc: Anıl Plas delivers its products to you in the safest and fastest way, wherever you are in the world.

v2.title: Number #1 in Production
v2.desc: All our products are prepared with flawless and high quality raw materials and workmanship.

v3.title: On Time Delivery
v3.desc: We are a phone call away for your orders. Your products are prepared and delivered on the date you specify.

products.heroDesc: Explore the professional solutions we offer with 30 years of experience in insulation and waterproofing.

certificates.introDesc: As Anıl Plas, we fully comply with international standards and legal regulations in all our production processes. The quality of our products is certified by independent organizations.

tse.title: Anıl Plas Drainage Board TSE
tse.desc: Official quality conformity certificate issued by the Turkish Standards Institute (TSE) for drainage boards produced by Anıl Plas. It certifies the compliance of our products with national quality and safety standards.

marka.title: Trademark Registration Certificate
marka.desc: Official registration certificate of the Anıl Plas brand before the Turkish Patent and Trademark Office. It shows that our brand identity and rights are under legal protection.

references.introDesc: With the trust and experience of years, we are proud to be a solution partner to the leading companies in Turkey and the world. We set quality standards together in the insulation and construction sector.

cta.title: Join Our Solution Partners
cta.desc: Let's plan the most suitable insulation solutions for your project together with our professional team.

about.title: 30 Years of Experience and Innovative Production
about.desc: Anıl Plas Plastik İnşaat İzolasyon İmalat Sanayi A.Ş. has been serving the sector for 30 years by producing Waterproofing Materials, Membranes and Under-tile Covers. In 2019, it strengthened its power by starting the production of foundation walls Drainage Board and Polyethylene Nylon with the Anıl Plas brand.
about.alt: Anıl Plas Factory and Production Area

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say About Us

items.t1: I can reach them and obtain the necessary materials whenever I call. It is a company I work with continuously. I definitely recommend Anıl Plas. Wishing to work together for many years.
items.t2: After ordering Anıl Plas products for the first time, I order continuously. They helped us in the best way for our bulk product requests.
items.t3: The products arrived faster than I expected. We did not experience any problems in terms of delivery or communication. I thank Anıl Plas company.
